googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Joana Ellis
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Fast service.  Professional.  Reasonably priced.  I highly recommend GFG Contractors and wish I could give more than 5 stars!

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Shaz Tellis
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Fast and efficient service! Be sure to check to make sure your attic light is turned off because I found out mine wasn't two weeks later. Not sure if prices are comparable to other plumbers in the area since I only got one quote from GFG, though, I suspect them to be a little pricier.

plumberResearchFull.json:
Here is the detailed information about G F G Contractor LLC, based on the provided identifiers:

## Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**: G F G Contractor LLC is registered as a Limited Liability Company (LLC) in Alabama. The business was started on December 15, 2008[1].
- **Physical Location and Service Areas**: The business is located at 4305 Norman Bridge Rd, Suite H, Montgomery, AL 36105. They serve the greater Montgomery, AL area[1][3][5].
- **Hours and Payment Methods**: There is no specific information available on the business hours or payment methods. However, they can be contacted at +1 334-315-0396 for more details[1][3][5].
- **Years in Operation**: As of the current date, G F G Contractor LLC has been in operation for approximately 16 years, having started in December 2008[1].

## Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered**: G F G Contractor LLC specializes in plumbing services. They provide various plumbing services, including but not limited to, rerouting kitchen sink and washing machine drains, and other general plumbing repairs[1][3][5].
- **Service Areas Covered**: They serve the Montgomery, AL area, including commercial, healthcare, institutional, and residential sectors[5].
- **Emergency Service Availability**: There is no explicit mention of emergency service availability, but given their comprehensive service offerings, it is likely they can handle urgent plumbing issues[1][3][5].
- **Prices or Rates**: There is no detailed information on specific prices or rates. Customers would need to contact the business directly for estimates and pricing[1][3].

## Customer Reviews & Reputation:

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**:
  - Customers have praised the business for being professional, punctual, friendly, and knowledgeable. For example, T B gave a 5-star review mentioning that the company did an awesome job rerouting the kitchen sink and washing machine drain. Earnestine P also gave a 5-star review highlighting their professionalism and timely service[3].
  - However, there are some mixed reviews, such as Shaz T's 3-star review, which mentioned efficient service but also an oversight regarding an attic light[3].
- **BBB Rating and Status**: G F G Contractor LLC is not a BBB Accredited Business but has an A+ BBB rating. The business has been listed with the BBB since June 30, 2011[1].
- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**: Customers often praise the professionalism, punctuality, and friendliness of the staff. Some reviews also highlight the efficiency and quality of the work done[3].
- **Response to Reviews**: There is no information available on how the business responds to customer reviews, but the overall positive feedback suggests a good customer service approach[3].

## Owner & Staff:

- **Owner/Management Information**: The owner of G F G Contractor LLC is Mr. Alexander Drake. He is also listed as the principal contact and customer contact for the business[1][2].
- **Staff Qualifications**: There is no detailed information available on the qualifications of the staff beyond the owner's involvement. However, the positive customer reviews suggest a competent and skilled team[1][3].
- **Professional Certifications**: The business is associated with the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, indicating compliance with state regulations and certifications[1].
aboutUs: G F G Contractor LLC is a premier plumbing company serving the Montgomery, AL area. Our team of skilled professionals specializes in comprehensive plumbing services, from rerouting kitchen and laundry drains to complex repairs. With a deep commitment to excellence, we provide top-notch solutions tailored to your unique needs.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the ultimate in plumbing expertise with G F G Contractor LLC – where quality, efficiency, and customer satisfaction are our top priorities.
sellingPoints: Highly trained and certified technicians equipped with the latest tools and techniques to tackle any plumbing challenge.
Prompt and reliable service, ensuring your plumbing issues are resolved quickly and effectively.
Personalized solutions tailored to your specific requirements, ensuring optimal results every time.
